name: 陳惠芬
objective: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
schedule:
9/11 Week 1:Introduction
9/18 Week 2: Strategy for Listening
9/25 Week 3: Strategy for Reading
10/2 Week 4: Vocabulary
10/9 Week 5: Introduction and Strategies to Part 1
10/16 Week 6: Introduction and Strategies to Part 2
10/23 Week 7: Practice Test Parts 1 & 2
10/30 Week 8: Introduction and Strategies to Part 3
11/6 Week 9: Introduction and Strategies to Part 4
11/13 Week 10: Practice Test Parts 3 & 4
11/20 Week 11: Introduction and Strategies to Part 5
11/27 Week 12: Introduction and Strategies to Part 6
12/4 Week 13: Practice Test Parts 5 & 6
12/11 Week 14: Introduction and Strategies to Part 7
12/18 Week 15: Practice Test Part 7
12/25 Week 16: Mock TOEIC test 1
1/1 Week 17: No class (New Year)
1/8 Week 18: Mock TOEIC test 2
